cloudflare-pages.title: Domain {{sub}} Successfully Added!
cloudflare-pages.message: Please add your custom domain in your Cloudflare Pages project settings to complete the setup.

discord-verification.title: Domain {{sub}} TXT Record Added!
discord-verification.message: Wait a few minutes then try verifying your domain on Discord

github-pages.title: Domain {{sub}} Successfully Added!
github-pages.message: Head over to your GitHub Pages repository’s settings and add the custom domain there.

hashnode-blogs.title: Domain {{sub}} Successfully Added!
hashnode-blogs.message: Please configure your custom domain in your Hashnode blog settings.

improvmx.title: MX Records for {{sub}} Added!
improvmx.message: Configure the MX records in your DNS to start receiving email via ImprovMX.

netlify.title: Domain {{sub}} Successfully Added!
netlify.message: Now add your custom domain in your Netlify dashboard under Site Settings → Domain management.

railway.title: Domain {{sub}} Successfully Added!
railway.message: Please add the custom domain in your Railway project settings.

vercel.title: Domain {{sub}} Successfully Added!
vercel.message: Please verify the TXT record in your Vercel dashboard under Domains.
